Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP027
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP027.Network.Server

Class Lobby

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP027.Network.Server.Lobby
public class Lobby
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Lobby()
    Constructor: where the application start.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void BuildOnGivenCell​(ClientHandler client, java.lang.String chosenCell)
    Method that gets the chosen cell id on which to perform the build and sends it to the match of the player that has made the choice
    void BuildOnGivenCellForAtlas​(ClientHandler client, java.lang.String chosenCell, java.lang.String build_BorD)
    Method that gets the chosen cell id on which to perform the build and sends it to the match of the player that has made the choice
    int checkIfAGamerIsAlreadyRegistered​(ClientHandler client)
    Method that checks if a gamer with the same nickname has already entered the lobby
    SantoriniMatch createMatch​(int playersCount)
    Method that creates a Match with its separate thread and adds it to the list of matches of the lobby
    void deregisterPlayer​(ClientHandler client)
    Method that deregisters a player, removing it from the gamers and from its match's players If the match hadn't started yet, the lobby creates a new match for the remaining players (as their match cannot start anymore, lacking a player) with their previous match's required number of players
    void doEndActionOnGivenCell​(ClientHandler client, java.lang.String chosenCell)
    Method that gets the chosen cell id on which to perform the end and sends it to the match of the player that has made the choice
    void MoveWorkerOnGivenCell​(ClientHandler client, java.lang.String chosenCell)
    Method that gets the chosen cell id where the worker has to be moved and sends it to the match of the player that has made the choice
    void passBuild​(ClientHandler client)
    Method that skips the build for the player that has made the choice
    void passEnd​(ClientHandler client)
    Method that skips the end for the player that has made the choice
    void passMove​(ClientHandler client)
    Method that skips the move for the player that has made the choice
    boolean registerNewPlayer​(ClientHandler client)
    Method that registers a new player in the lobby if possible
    void removeMatch​(SantoriniMatch santoriniMatch)
    Method that removes a match from the list of matches of the lobby
    void searchMatch​(ClientHandler client, int playersCount)
    Method that searches for a Match for the gamer that entered the lobby keeping in mind the number of players with which the gamer wants to play with
    void SetChosenGodOfPlayer​(ClientHandler client, java.lang.String chosengod)
    Method that gets the chosen god by a player among the chosen gods that the first gamer that entered the match chose and sets it as the player's god card
    void SetChosenGodsOnMatch​(ClientHandler client, java.util.List<java.lang.String> chosengods)
    Method that gets the chosen gods by the client (chosen by the first gamer that entered the match) and asks the match to save them
    void SetChosenWorker​(ClientHandler client, java.lang.String chosenWorker)
    Method that gets the chosen worker's cell id and sets it to the match of the player that has made the choice
    void SetFirstPlayerOnMatch​(ClientHandler client, java.lang.String chosenplayer)
    Method that gets the chosen player by the first gamer that entered the match among the players in the match itself and sets it as the first player of the list of players.
    void SetWorkersFirstPosition​(ClientHandler client, java.util.List<java.lang.String> chosenpositions)
    Method that gets the workers' starting positions chosen by the player and places them on the board, updating it.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Lobby

      public Lobby()
      Constructor: where the application start. It instantiates an empty list of matches that will then be filled as the players enter the lobby

  • Method Details

    • createMatch

      public SantoriniMatch createMatch​(int playersCount)
      Method that creates a Match with its separate thread and adds it to the list of matches of the lobby
      Parameters:
      playersCount - number of players that the match that is being created will require in order to be played (it is chosen by the player who triggers this creation when there are no available matches with the desired number of players, therefore creating one with the chosen parameter)
      Returns:
      the match created

    • removeMatch

      public void removeMatch​(SantoriniMatch santoriniMatch)
      Method that removes a match from the list of matches of the lobby
      Parameters:
      santoriniMatch - match to remove

    • checkIfAGamerIsAlreadyRegistered

      public int checkIfAGamerIsAlreadyRegistered​(ClientHandler client)
      Method that checks if a gamer with the same nickname has already entered the lobby
      Parameters:
      client - identifying the gamer
      Returns:
      0 if not present, -1 if there is another gamer using the given nickname

    • registerNewPlayer

      public boolean registerNewPlayer​(ClientHandler client)
      Method that registers a new player in the lobby if possible
      Parameters:
      client - identifying the gamer to add to the lobby gamers
      Returns:
      the gamer object added to the lobby if any or null

    • deregisterPlayer

      public void deregisterPlayer​(ClientHandler client)
      Method that deregisters a player, removing it from the gamers and from its match's players If the match hadn't started yet, the lobby creates a new match for the remaining players (as their match cannot start anymore, lacking a player) with their previous match's required number of players
      Parameters:
      client - identifying the gamer to deregister

    • searchMatch

      public void searchMatch​(ClientHandler client, int playersCount)
      Method that searches for a Match for the gamer that entered the lobby keeping in mind the number of players with which the gamer wants to play with
      Parameters:
      client - identifying the gamer that wants to enter a match
      playersCount - number of players of the type of match the gamer wants to play (2 or 3)

    • SetChosenGodsOnMatch

      public void SetChosenGodsOnMatch​(ClientHandler client, java.util.List<java.lang.String> chosengods)
      Method that gets the chosen gods by the client (chosen by the first gamer that entered the match) and asks the match to save them
      Parameters:
      client - identifying the gamer that chose the gods
      chosengods - list of the names of the gods that are going to be used in the match

    • SetChosenGodOfPlayer

      public void SetChosenGodOfPlayer​(ClientHandler client, java.lang.String chosengod)
      Method that gets the chosen god by a player among the chosen gods that the first gamer that entered the match chose and sets it as the player's god card
      Parameters:
      client - identifying the gamer that chose the god
      chosengod - name of the god that the player wants to have as a god card

    • SetFirstPlayerOnMatch

      public void SetFirstPlayerOnMatch​(ClientHandler client, java.lang.String chosenplayer)
      Method that gets the chosen player by the first gamer that entered the match among the players in the match itself and sets it as the first player of the list of players. This will be the first one to place its workers and to play a turn.
      Parameters:
      client - identifying the gamer that chose the player
      chosenplayer - nickname of the player that will be the first to place its workers and then start the game

    • SetWorkersFirstPosition

      public void SetWorkersFirstPosition​(ClientHandler client, java.util.List<java.lang.String> chosenpositions)
      Method that gets the workers' starting positions chosen by the player and places them on the board, updating it.
      Parameters:
      client - identifying the gamer that chose the positions
      chosenpositions - chosen positions where to place the player's 2 workers on the board before starting the game

    • SetChosenWorker

      public void SetChosenWorker​(ClientHandler client, java.lang.String chosenWorker)
      Method that gets the chosen worker's cell id and sets it to the match of the player that has made the choice
      Parameters:
      client - identifying the player that chose the worker
      chosenWorker - id of the chosen worker's cell

    • MoveWorkerOnGivenCell

      public void MoveWorkerOnGivenCell​(ClientHandler client, java.lang.String chosenCell)
      Method that gets the chosen cell id where the worker has to be moved and sends it to the match of the player that has made the choice
      Parameters:
      client - identifying the player that chose the cell
      chosenCell - id of the chosen cell where to move the worker

    • passMove

      public void passMove​(ClientHandler client)
      Method that skips the move for the player that has made the choice
      Parameters:
      client - identifying the player that wants to skip the move

    • BuildOnGivenCell

      public void BuildOnGivenCell​(ClientHandler client, java.lang.String chosenCell)
      Method that gets the chosen cell id on which to perform the build and sends it to the match of the player that has made the choice
      Parameters:
      client - identifying the player that chose the cell
      chosenCell - id of the chosen cell

    • BuildOnGivenCellForAtlas

      public void BuildOnGivenCellForAtlas​(ClientHandler client, java.lang.String chosenCell, java.lang.String build_BorD)
      Method that gets the chosen cell id on which to perform the build and sends it to the match of the player that has made the choice
      Parameters:
      client - identifying the player that chose the cell
      chosenCell - id of the chosen cell
      build_BorD - string stating if on the cell the player wants to build a block (B) or a dome (D)

    • passBuild

      public void passBuild​(ClientHandler client)
      Method that skips the build for the player that has made the choice
      Parameters:
      client - identifying the player that wants to skip the build

    • doEndActionOnGivenCell

      public void doEndActionOnGivenCell​(ClientHandler client, java.lang.String chosenCell)
      Method that gets the chosen cell id on which to perform the end and sends it to the match of the player that has made the choice
      Parameters:
      client - identifying the player that chose the cell
      chosenCell - id of the chosen cell

    • passEnd

      public void passEnd​(ClientHandler client)
      Method that skips the end for the player that has made the choice
      Parameters:
      client - identifying the player that wants to skip the end
